Html:
Hi there,

Could someone please explain to me why when i check moonkin form it adds 997 spell damage to my total?

That seems a little off considering that i only have 667 spirit and i should be getting only 100 spell damage from that.  Nothing else is added while in moonkin form for me atm (i'm not specced in mss) so i'm not sure why it's doing that?

Not that it's wrong; just, there's no other moonkin only spellpower boosters, other than the spirit & mss ones.

i think it might be off by a decimal point because i've been adding and readding and i cant get my spellpower that high.  i don't know how to get into the files and fix it to check and see if that's the problem, either.
It's a known issue, fixed in the source since this morning.  It'll be in the next release.  You're actually exactly right, it was off by a decimal point.

thanks alot :)

really amazing that you guys got it out this fast.

Do you happen to know when the next release will be?
